main event: Pilots of military aircraft observed a stationary light that broke up into 4 separate lights, which maneuvered and finally extinguished in Nouasseur, French Morocco on March 27, 1954.
interesting points: The object displayed erratic movements at various times., Pilots reported that one of the lights was stationary before breaking apart., There was a possible ground reflection due to inversion reported by one pilot., The sighting lasted for about 1-2 minutes., Multiple types of observations were made (Ground-Visual and Air-Visual).
sighted object: one stationary light that broke into four lights
witness description: pilots of RC-97 and C-54 military aircraft
